titleStmt.title: The case of indifferent things used in the worship of God proposed and stated, by considering these questions : Qu. I. Whether things indifferent used in divine worship (or, whether there be any things indifferent in the worship of God?) : Qu. II. Whether a restraint of our liberty in the use of such indifferent things be a violation of it?
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.

titleStmt.title: The case of indifferent things used in the worship of God proposed and stated, by considering these questions : Qu. I. Whether things indifferent used in divine worship (or, whether there be any things indifferent in the worship of God?) : Qu. II. Whether a restraint of our liberty in the use of such indifferent things be a violation of it?
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Redmayne, Jun. for Fincham Gardiner ...,
